entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
